docs.snippet: The Comcast-Time Warner Cable deal is off, but that doesn't mean that there aren't collisions ahead in the cable universe. Here are the biggest players in the field who are seeking to offset rising costs for the shows and sports that they pipe to ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Comcast-Time Warner Cable deal is off, but that doesn't mean that there aren't collisions ahead in the cable universe. Here are the biggest players in the field who are seeking to offset rising costs for the shows and sports that they pipe to viewers, potentially through a merger, acquisition or takeover.

headline.main: Biggest US Players in the Cable Game
headline.print_headline: Biggest US Players in the Cable Game

docs.snippet: The NCAA put Oklahoma State's football program on a year of probation Friday for failing to follow its own drug-testing policies over a four-year span, largely sparing the Cowboys of serious penalties for violations uncovered following an expose b...
docs.lead_paragraph: The NCAA put Oklahoma State's football program on a year of probation Friday for failing to follow its own drug-testing policies over a four-year span, largely sparing the Cowboys of serious penalties for violations uncovered following an expose by Sports Illustrated.

headline.main: NCAA Puts Oklahoma St on Probation for Infractions

docs.snippet: The Yankees, who host the Subway Series beginning Friday, have won six of seven. But no team is playing as well as the Mets, who have a chance to do something they have never done in their history....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Yankees, who host the Subway Series beginning Friday, have won six of seven. But no team is playing as well as the Mets, who have a chance to do something they have never done in their history.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column holds that while New York Mets are doing extremely well so far, having tied their previous record of 11-game winning streak, success could simply be indication that other National League East teams are particularly bad this season; upcoming series against New York Yankees could prove to be indication of how well Mets will do in regular season.

headline.main: Next Stop on Mets’ Express: The Bronx
headline.print_headline: Next Stop on Mets’ Express: The Bronx

docs.snippet: With combatants fighting in neighborhoods and Saudi-led coalition warplanes pounding Iran-backed rebels from the sky, Yemen's war is wreaking a particularly bloody toll among civilians: more than 550 have been killed in the past month, including 1...
docs.lead_paragraph: With combatants fighting in neighborhoods and Saudi-led coalition warplanes pounding Iran-backed rebels from the sky, Yemen's war is wreaking a particularly bloody toll among civilians: more than 550 have been killed in the past month, including 115 children, the U.N. said Friday.

headline.main: UN: High Civilian Toll in Yemen Conflict; At Least 550 Dead
headline.print_headline: UN: High Civilian Toll in Yemen Conflict; At Least 550 Dead

docs.snippet: More than 150,000 people have been forced to flee to other cities or into the countryside, while others have crossed the borders to Saudi Arabia or Oman....
docs.lead_paragraph: More than 150,000 people have been forced to flee to other cities or into the countryside, while others have crossed the borders to Saudi Arabia or Oman.
docs.abstract: Tens of thousands of Yemenis are risking their lives at sea in effort to escape ongoing violence; more than 240 migrants died in 2014 while crossing the Gulf of Aden.

headline.main: Fighting Prompts an Exodus From Yemen, Often on Boats
headline.print_headline: Fighting Prompts an Exodus From Yemen, Often on Boats
